TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProcessModelInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含用于返回有关辅助进程的信息的方法。

span.span: Contains methods that return information about worker processes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类并不是在你自己的代码实例化。The class is not meant to be instantiated in your own code. 使用静态和填充方法对象，以及如何将属性对象以获取有关进程的信息。Use the static and methods to populate objects, and then use the properties of the objects to obtain information about the processes. > [!NOTE] > 和仅使用 Microsoft Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 版本 Microsoft Windows 2000 和 Windows XP 上 5.0 或与在 Windows Server 2003 和使用 IIS 5.0 隔离模式的 IIS 6.0，可以使用方法。The and methods can be used only with Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) version 5.0 on Microsoft Windows 2000 and Windows XP or with IIS 6.0 on Windows Server 2003 and using IIS 5.0 isolation mode. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 为 ASP.NET 版本配置 ASP.NET 应用程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3e2037d2-61aa-44f3-b84e-d4dab3572ad3)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Configure ASP.NET Applications for an ASP.NET Version](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3e2037d2-61aa-44f3-b84e-d4dab3572ad3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法以在网页上显示有关当前正在执行的 ASP.NET 进程的统计信息。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to display statistics about the currently executing ASP.NET process on a Web page. 此示例将处理在 Windows 2000 和 Windows XP 上的 Internet 信息服务 5.0 或在 Windows Server 2003 和使用 IIS 5.0 隔离模式的 IIS 6.0。This example will work with Internet Information Services 5.0 on Windows 2000 and Windows XP or with IIS 6.0 on Windows Server 2003 and using IIS 5.0 isolation mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.ProcessModelInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ProcessModelInfo/CS/processinfo1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.ProcessModelInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ProcessModelInfo/VB/processinfo1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.ProcessInfo GetCurrentProcessInfo() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCurrentProcessInfo () As ProcessInfo

summary.span: 返回有关执行当前请求的辅助进程的信息。

span.span: Returns information about the worker process that is executing the current request.

returns.span: ，它包含有关当前进程的信息。

span.span: A that contains information about the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是仅适用于在 ASP.NET 过程模型下运行的应用程序。The method is applicable only for applications that are running under the ASP.NET process model. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法以在网页上显示有关当前正在执行的 ASP.NET 进程的统计信息。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to display statistics about the currently executing ASP.NET process on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.ProcessModelInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ProcessModelInfo/CS/processinfo1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.ProcessModelInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ProcessModelInfo/VB/processinfo1vb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 进程信息对于当前请求不可用。

span.span: Process information is not available for the current request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.ProcessInfo[] GetHistory(int32 numRecords) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetHistory (numRecords As Integer) As ProcessInfo()

param.name: numRecords
param.span: 请求其信息的进程的数目。

span.span: The number of processes for which information is requested.

summary.span: 返回有关近期的辅助进程的信息。

span.span: Returns information about recent worker processes.

returns.span: 最近的 对象（最多 100 个）的数组；如果可用对象的数目小于 ，则返回所有可用对象。

span.span: An array of the most recent objects (up to 100); otherwise, if the number of available objects is less than , all available objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是仅适用于在 ASP.NET 过程模型下运行的应用程序。The method is applicable only for applications that are running under the ASP.NET process model.
